# verbose

Logs a message with additional arguments if the logging level permits it.

## Import

```ts
import { Logger } from "@aa-sdk/core";
```

## Usage

```ts
import { Logger } from "@aa-sdk/core";

Logger.verbose("Something is happening");
```

## Parameters

### msg

`string`
The message to log

### args

`...any[]`
Additional arguments to be logged
